page.title: 07COUNTRY PARK.
page.content: When you go to our country park there are many things the visitor can find of interest. The whole park covers 700 acres but most of it is outside our survey.We do have most of the activities that can be enjoyed in our area.As well as canoeing,sailing,archery and climbing there is fishing for trout and orienteering. A bird-watching group has been started at the centre. People watch out for early summer visitors such as swallows,martins and warblers. The resident birds on the loch provide a year round interest. Our park provides the public with all the things mentioned above. With its mixed woodland, crags and water the park is a very pleasant place to visit.
